title: Cards in czech language
body:
I was about to pre-order the MvM, but i realized that it isn't transfered into czech. Somewhere, I've read that you will be adding czech language to the game if the you see, that czech people are going to purchase this. Majority of people in Czech republic loves board games, and especially those that has awesome looking board and figures. So I wanted to ask you, if czech language is still in your plans for MvM and if it is, when should we expect the game to be realeased with the czech translation.

Thank you for your anwers.

replies.body: Currently the only translated versions we have committed to are German and Chinese, however we are evaluating a number of other languages (including Czech) for possible language pack upgrades in the near future. A language pack would essentially supplement an English copy of the game. Also, if you check the website right now, I believe you can download the rulebook and dossiers in Czech.

As you said, the rulebook is avaiable in the czech language. Thank you for your quick response. I am happy to see that you are planning translate MvM to czech. 

Thanks a lot.

Kades and Catzpaw can give you the definitive answer, but I'm pretty sure it'll be based on how many units have been sold to your language region. afaik, the german version is in production and they're considering chinese. I haven't heard anything about Czech.
